definition.name: Lightning Flow Scan
definition.description: Scan Salesforce Flows for best practices, security, and performance issues.
definition.author: Ruben Halman

inputs.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
inputs.description: GitHub token with `contents:read` and `security-events:write` permissions. Optional — defaults to the built-in `github.token` if not provided.

inputs.name: threshold
inputs.description:
Minimum severity to fail the action in **table** mode (note, warning, error).
**Ignored in `sarif` mode** — any result fails the action.
Optional — no default.

inputs.name: outputMode
inputs.description:
Output format:
- `sarif` (default): Uploads to GitHub Code Scanning. **Fails on any result**.
- `table`: Logs results in console. Fails only if severity >= `threshold`.

outputs.name: sarifPath
outputs.description: Path to the generated SARIF file (only in `sarif` mode)

outputs.name: scanResults
outputs.description: Array of scan results in table format (only in `table` mode)
